attributes.review: Absolutely horrible. Ruined my career and took my family. I’m going to throw up it was so awful I couldn’t even get past the first screen🤮🤮🤮. Anyway... black lives matter, defund the police, abolish ICE, and don’t reopen schools until it is actually safe.

attributes.review: when i got the app and opened it there was this huge ugly cheeto staring at me. so i panicked and closed it. but then i opened it again, and then there were racist pedophiles around the cheeto. so i was like “ew.” and my friend told me that when she got the app the same thing happened to her. but instead she had roaches, alongside the cheeto and pedophiles. anyways i don’t recommend this app. it’s pure trash and i would give it 0 stars if i could! 0/10 would not recommend at all.

attributes.review: Hi, I'm Dr. Spencer Reid, I have an IQ of 187, I can read 20,000 words per minute, and I have an eidetic memory.
